name: H.A.R.S.T.
description:
Earth has been decimated by a deadly alien-virus ... Our last hope ? The H.A.R.S.T. Protocol.

Controls
  • A, D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to sprint
Features
  • 🔭 Explore what's left of Aurora-Rangi station
  • 🔬 Atmospheric authentic sci-fi
  • 🏃‍♂️ Conserve your sprinting and jumping for when it counts
  • 👩‍🔬 Some degree of randomization
  • 🥚 Easter-eggs
Known Issues
  • Sounds can get stuck in some states
  • Can scan without really scanning if you not in contact with a body (you're close to the body, but not close enough to trigger the popup)
  • NOTE: H to disable (or re-enable) camera shaking (in case it's too heavy).
Done with assets from
  • Freesound.org for sounds / music
  • Free Asset Packs from the Epic Marketplace for meshes / textures
  • Mixamo for animations

Made for Ludum Dare 52 in 2 days.
